definition.name: dirxml.engine.entitl-rs-purge-type
definition.description: The Config value used to take actions on purging entitlement results in an object.

definition.display-name: Allow Named Password to be retrieved over LDAP
definition.name: allow-fetch-named-passwords
definition.description: Allow Named Password to be retrieved over LDAP. If the value is true, then the named password value can be fetched.
